name: Blind Jumps
description: GD is too easy! Make every jump blind.

jccolour.name: Blind Colour
jccolour.description: The colour that covers your screen when you are 'blind' (Yes I spell colour with a U, I am Australian. Cry about it)

fomode.name: Fade out mode
fomode.description: Instead of instantly hiding the 'blinder', fade it out instead. (Incompatible with Flashbang Mode)

foduration.name: Fade Out Duration
foduration.description: How long the fading out from Fade Out mode takes.

flashbangmode.name: Flashbang Mode
flashbangmode.description: Makes it so when you click, instead of blinding you for the duration of your click, it blinds you and slowly fades back

flashbangduration.name: Flashbang Duration
flashbangduration.description: How long the fading out on the flashbang takes

fbsound.name: Enable Flashbang Sound
fbsound.description: Plays a sound when you are blinded. This works <cr>without</c> flashbang mode enabled and <cr>**IS HEAVILY NOT RECOMMENDED**</c> (like seriously please do not turn this on unless you want to go deaf)
